[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@elux/react-web](./react-web.md) &gt; [URouter](./react-web.urouter.md) &gt; [relaunch](./react-web.urouter.relaunch.md)

## URouter.relaunch() method

跳转一条路由，并清空所有历史记录，对应 [RouteHistoryAction.RELAUNCH](./react-web.routehistoryaction.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
relaunch(dataOrUrl: string | EluxLocation<S['params']> | StateLocation<S['params'], S['pagename']> | NativeLocation, root?: boolean, nonblocking?: boolean): void | Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataOrUrl | string \| [EluxLocation](./react-web.eluxlocation.md)<!-- -->&lt;S\['params'\]&gt; \| [StateLocation](./react-web.statelocation.md)<!-- -->&lt;S\['params'\], S\['pagename'\]&gt; \| [NativeLocation](./react-web.nativelocation.md) | 3种路由描述或3种路由协议的url，参见 [location()](./react-web.location.md) |
|  root | boolean | <code>ture</code>表示操作的是<code>窗口EWindow</code>的历史堆栈；<code>false</code>表示操作的是当前<code>窗口EWindow</code>里面的历史堆栈，默认为<code>false</code> |
|  nonblocking | boolean | <code>ture</code>表示如果一条路由切换过程中（未执行完成）又触发另一条新的路由切换，新的路由切换将随后继续执行；<code>false</code>表示忽略新的路由切换，默认为<code>false</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

void \| Promise&lt;void&gt;
